articles.title: “Organoid Intelligence” – Revolutionary Biocomputers Powered by Human Brain Cells - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Despite AI’s impressive track record, its computational power pales in comparison with a human brain. Now, scientists unveil a revolutionary path to drive computing forward: organoid intelligence, where lab-grown brain organoids act as biological hardware. Ar…
articles.content: Scientists are collaborating across multiple fields to create biocomputers that utilize three-dimensional cultures of brain cells, called brain organoids, as biological hardware. They have outlined t… [+4852 chars]
